# AVMIDIPlayer

**Class**

An object that plays MIDI data through a system sound module.

## Declaration

```swift
class AVMIDIPlayer
```

## Overview

For more information about preparing your app to play audio, see [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/AVFoundation/configuring-your-app-for-media-playback].



## Creating a MIDI player

- **init(contentsOf:soundBankURL:)**: Creates a player to play a MIDI file with the specified soundbank.
- **init(data:soundBankURL:)**: Creates a player to play MIDI data with the specified soundbank.

## Controlling playback

- **prepareToPlay()**: Prepares the player to play the sequence by prerolling all events.
- **play(_:)**: Plays the MIDI sequence.
- **AVMIDIPlayerCompletionHandler**: A callback the system invokes when MIDI playback completes.
- **stop()**: Stops playing the sequence.
- **isPlaying**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the sequence is playing.

## Configuring playback settings

- **rate**: The playback rate of the player.

## Accessing player timing

- **currentPosition**: The current playback position, in seconds.
- **duration**: The duration, in seconds, of the currently loaded file.

## Basic playback and recording

- **AVAudioPlayer**: An object that plays audio data from a file or buffer.
- **AVAudioRecorder**: An object that records audio data to a file.

## Inherits From

- NSObject

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSObjectProtocol
